title: Azir Passiv
body:
Hi Guys ,

I want to talk about the passiv of Azir.  
So Im a really good Azir Main Player on Midlane with 200 K LVL 7 mastery Point.
But the passiv of Azir only rarely helped me in some situations.
The shots are too slow and and the Tower HP is too low aswell.
Also the CD is very long for a Tower who just holds for 20-30 seconds!
On my mind u should buff the passiv or give a really new passiv (what i would like much more).

Thank you for reading my writing and I hope u start a good discussion ,

Your xGaKiiDo                  

Edit : Please write ur ideas for his new passiv if he gets one

replies.body: its just fine. his passive should not replace real towers xD so naturally his tower is weaker and shouldnt have a short cd.

But his tower is really really weak for the cd it has.

I mean they should give him a passiv who rly supports the Champion generally .
For example that he gets more movement Speed if he does smth or else.
I mean if his passiv is in CD so azir generally has no passiv so they should give him a passiv who supports him all the time like all other camps (Zed, Veigar ,Diana, Yasuo etc.)

Please jst write ur meanings , thank you .
